TEXT.S: San marino hya' ga cyux maki' tay 43 46 N, 12 25 E na Oco syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 61 sq km (maki' tay 229ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 61 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 0 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 33,285. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga 16.70 , lhlahuy hya' ga 0 , sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 83.30 . spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga San Marino (city). snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 3 na tay mqiru' byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Marino Riccardi, aring ryax 1 squ byacing tay 10 sa kawas 2016 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la.
